advisory.name: RLBA-2022:1798
advisory.synopsis: wayland-protocols bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for wayland-protocols is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

fixes.description: Rebase wayland-protocols to 1.22 or higher for KDE Plasma in EPEL
